Looks¶

Incoherent averaging (a.k.a. decimation or looking)

Look routine

pysar.image.looks.look(data, win, null=None, verbose=0)[source]¶

Incoherent averaging (looking) routine

Parameters:

data : 2D array

Input data

win : int or list

Filter window size in pixels scalar values use a square window list should be in order [across, down]

null : float or complex

Null value to exclude from filter window

verbose : int

1 = print line counter to screen; 0 = don’t
pysar.image.looks.look2D(data, win, null=None, verbose=0)[source]¶

Incoherent averaging (looking) routine

Parameters:

data : 2D array

Input data

win : int or list

Filter window size in pixels scalar values use a square window list should be in order [across, down]

null : float or complex

Null value to exclude from filter window

verbose : int

1 = print line counter to screen; 0 = don’t
